name: Small-Nut
flavour: A violin virtuoso, Small-Nut began taking lessons when he was still in the shell.

name: Sting Bean
abilities: Amphibious, {{Truestrike}}Bullseye, Team-Up
flavour: "I try to warn them, "This is going to sting." But the Zombies, they never listen."

name: Wall-Nut
abilities: Team-Up
flavour: Works well with others. Says so, right there on his resume.

name: Pismashio
abilities: Team-Up
flavour: "I'm a kind of ice cream! Sort of!"

name: Spineapple
abilities: When played: Plants with no Strength get +2{{Strength}}.
flavour: Don't let his gruff exterior fool you, he is always looking out for the little guy.

name: Potato Mine
abilities: Team-Up When destroyed: Do 2 damage to a Zombie here.
flavour: "I'm starchy and explosive!"

name: Cactus
abilities: {{Truestrike}}Bullseye
flavour: "It's true. I'm prickly on the outside but spongy on the inside."

name: Gardening Gloves
abilities: Move a Plant. Conjure a {{Trick:is:plant type:trick}}.
flavour: Made of the softest fabric for that gentle Plant touch.

name: Sea-Shroom
abilities: Amphibious
flavour: Teaches swimming lessons to disadvantaged Plants in his spare time.

name: Water Chestnut
abilities: Amphibious Team-Up
flavour: "300 laps a day, every day. That's how I do it."

name: Pea-Nut
abilities: Team-Up
flavour: "Mom was a Peashooter. Dad was a nut. Everyone said it wouldn't work, but they were wrong."

name: Steel Magnolia
abilities: When played: Plants here and next door get +2{{Heart}}.
flavour: She's got nerves of steel... and everything else of steel!

name: Photosynthesizer
abilities: A Plant gets +2{{Heart}}. Conjure a {{Galactic Gardens:is:plant set:g}} card.
flavour: "The galaxy is one beautiful melody, so play!"

name: Spikeweed Sector
abilities: Before combat here: Do 2 damage to a Zombie here.
flavour: Quite similar to the region known as Pokey Province.

name: Plantern
abilities: While in an Environment: This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}} and {{Truestrike}}Bullseye.
flavour: Past job experience includes: Shooing away creepy fog.

name: Grape Responsibility
abilities: Double a Plant's {{Heart}}.
flavour: When you think of responsibility, think of grapes.

name: Primal Potato Mine
abilities: When destroyed: Do 3 damage to a Zombie here.
flavour: Hidden long ago in Hollow Earth, Dinosaurs ran rampant in The Land Before Mine.

name: Grizzly Pear
abilities: Amphibious
flavour: It's true what they say, "Never get between a Grizzly Pear and her cub." Doubly true for Zombies.

name: Grave Buster
abilities: Destroy a Gravestone.
flavour: "MUST. DESTROY. GRAVES."

name: Hibernating Beary
abilities: When hurt: This gets +4{{Strength}}.
flavour: Don't poke the beary.

name: Prickly Pear
abilities: Team-Up When hurt: Do 2 damage to the Zombie Hero.
flavour: "You hurt me, I hurt you. That's how this works."

name: Smackadamia
abilities: Amphibious When played: Your {{Nuts:tribe:nut type:f}} get +2{{Heart}}.
flavour: Smackadamia wasn't born with smack smarts. He studied hard. He's a smackademic.

name: Tough Beets
abilities: {{Armored}}Armored 1 When played: This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}} for each other Plant and Zombie.
flavour: He grew up on the wrong side of the garden.

name: Cosmic Nut
abilities: When played: Conjure a {{Nut:tribe:nut}}, and its {{Strength}} becomes 4{{Strength}}.
flavour: A staunch believer in numerology, he'll go on at length about the significance of the number 3 if you let him.

name: Starch-Lord
abilities: When you play a {{Root:tribe:root type:f include:token}}, both the {{Roots:tribe:root type:f include:token}} get +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}}. Start of turn: Conjure a {{Root:tribe:root include:token}}.
flavour: His destiny is written in the starch.

name: Blockbuster
abilities: {{Truestrike}}Bullseye Plant Evolution: Destroy all Gravestones here and next door.
flavour: They call it a graveyard. She calls it a buffet.

name: Pumpkin Shell
abilities: Fusion: A Plant played on this gets +2{{Strength}}/+4{{Heart}}.
flavour: "Build your house on a solid foundation," they said. "Build your house on pumpkin."

name: Jugger-Nut
abilities: {{Armored}}Armored 1, {{Truestrike}}Bullseye, Team-Up
flavour: What's better than a Wall-Nut? A Wall-Nut in a suit of armor, that's what.

name: Guacodile
abilities: Amphibious When destroyed: Do 4 damage to a Zombie here.
flavour: "Technically I'm a food, not a Plant."

name: Mirror-Nut
abilities: Team-Up {{Truestrike}}Bullseye When your {{Nuts:tribe:nut type:f}} get hurt, do 1 damage to the Zombie Hero.
flavour: Dressed up as a mirrorball for a disco-themed party. Never looked back.

name: Doom-Shroom
abilities: Destroy all Plants and Zombies with 4{{Strength}} or more. Conjure a {{Mushroom:tribe:mushroom cost<5}} card that costs 4 or less
flavour: "I could destroy everything you hold dear. It wouldn't be hard."

name: Galacta-Cactus
abilities: {{Truestrike}}Bullseye When destroyed: Do 1 damage to everything.
flavour: "I take pity on no one. For I am Galacta-Cactus!"

name: Force Field
abilities: Plants here can't be hurt.
flavour: It's a force of nature.

name: Gravitree
abilities: {{Armored}}Armored 1 {{Untrickable}}Untrickable When a Zombie is played, move it here.
flavour: The apple doesn't fall far from the tree. Neither does anything else.

name: Three-Nut
abilities: When a Plant is played: That plant's {{Strength}} becomes 3{{Strength}}.
flavour: They say two heads are better than one. Three-Nut just took the next evolutionary step.

name: Primal Wall-Nut
abilities: Team-Up {{Untrickable}}Untrickable When played: Conjure a {{card: is:plant c>=4}} that costs 4{{Sun}} or more.
flavour: You can't be destroyed by a Rolling Stone when you basically are a Rolling Stone.

name: Marine Bean
abilities: Amphibious When played: This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}} for each other {{Amphibious:is:plant a:amphibious type:p}} Plant.
flavour: Of course beans evolved gills. How else would they breathe underwater?

name: Poppin' Poppies
abilities: When played: Make {{Lil' Buddies:Lil' Buddy}} here and next door.
flavour: Makes friends wherever she goes.

name: Soul Patch
abilities: {{Armored}}Armored 1 If your Hero would get hurt, this gets hurt instead.
flavour: Has been gently encouraging Cherry Bomb and Sour Grapes to attend his meditation class.

name: Wall-Nut Bowling
abilities:
Make a {{Wall-Nut:Wall-Nut c:1}} in each Ground lane.
Attack for 6 damage in those lanes.
flavour: Ugly shoes not required!

name: Body-Gourd
abilities: Team-Up Amphibious When played: Fill your Super-Block Meter to full.
flavour: He moonlights as a decorative center piece during the fall.

name: Pecanolith
abilities: All Plants and Zombies attack using their {{Heart}} instead of their {{Strength}}.
flavour: No one knows where he came from. He just appeared one day. But everyone who comes in contact with him feels... changed somehow.

name: Tricarrotops
abilities: {{Truestrike}}Bullseye Dino-Roar: This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}}.
flavour: Beta-Carrotina tracked Huge-Gigantacus all the way down the Meteor-Z-carved tunnel to Hollow Earth. Carrots there had evolved in a very different direction.

name: Loco Coco
abilities: When played: Make {{Wall-Nuts:Wall-Nut c:1}} next door. Nut Evolution: All Plants with no {{Strength}} get +3{{Strength}}.
flavour: He crowned himself King of All Hollow Earth. No one had the heart to tell him it was actually a parliamentary democracy.

name: Forget-Me-Nuts
abilities: Zombie Tricks cost 2{{Brain}} more.
flavour: "I'd forget my own flower if it wasn't stuck to my head. Wait, what were we talking about?"

name: Garlic
abilities: Team-Up When a Zombie hurts this, move that Zombie to the left. If it's a {{Vimpire:Vimpire}}, destroy it.
flavour: "Vimpires. They're the worst. I don't like to use the word "hate" but yeah, I hate 'em."

name: Corn Dog
abilities: Amphibious Hunt
flavour: "Who's a good vegetable? You are! Yes, you are!"

name: Hot Date
abilities: When played: Move a Zombie to this lane. When destroyed: Do 3 damage to a Zombie here.
flavour: He's a hot commodity on dating sites such as eGardening, Thatch.com, and OKTulip.

name: Health-Nut
abilities: This attacks using its {{Heart}} instead of its {{Strength}}.
flavour: He always skips leg day.

name: Pear Cub
abilities: Amphibious When destroyed: Make a 5{{Strength}}/4{{Heart}} {{Grizzly Pear:Grizzly Pear}} with Amphibious here and {{Fruit:t:Fruit type:f include:token}} Plants get +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}}.
flavour: So cute and cuddly and ... wait, what's that growling sound?

name: Shamrocket
abilities: Destroy a Zombie with 4{{Strength}} or more.
flavour: The bigger they are, the harder they go boom.

name: Red Stinger
abilities: Team-Up When played behind a Plant: This becomes 7{{Strength}}/3{{Heart}}.
flavour: "I do stretching exercises every morning," he says. "It's important to stay physically and mentally nimble."

name: Hothead
abilities: Team-Up When destroyed: Do 6 damage to a Zombie here.
flavour: Sure, he has an explosive temper. But for the most part, he's pretty even peeled.

name: Bubble Up
abilities: Move a Plant. It gets +4{{Heart}} and Team-Up.
flavour: Who doesn't like bubbles? Zombies...that's who.

name: Nut Signal
abilities:
Make a {{Wall-Nut:Wall-Nut c:1}}.
Draw a card.
flavour: Call on Wall-Nut any time. His schedule is wide open.

name: Root Wall
abilities: A Plant gets +2{{Heart}} and can't be hurt this turn.
flavour: A good way to root for the Plants.

name: Ensign Uproot
abilities: Amphibious When played: Move another Plant or Zombie.
flavour: His mighty tractor beam is straight off the farm and out of this world.

name: Button Mushroom
flavour: Everyone's always telling her, "You're cute as a button!" But she's not just cute. She's smart and funny too.

name: Berry Blast
abilities: Do 3 damage.
flavour: Vicious AND nutritious.

name: Buff-Shroom
abilities: When played: All {{Mushrooms:tribe:mushroom type:f}} get +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}}.
flavour: You might know him from his wildly popular series of workout videos called "30 Days to a Buff-Shroom Body."

name: Seedling
abilities: Start of Turn: This transforms into a random {{Plant:is:plant type:f c<=6 include:token -"Magic Beanstalk"}} that costs 6{{Sun}} or less.
flavour: t's the tiny seed of a... nobody actually knows.

name: Zapricot
flavour: "Some say that Zombies aren't easily shocked. I beg to differ."

name: Poison Mushroom
abilities: {{Anti-Hero}}Anti-Hero 2
flavour: "Zombie Heroes. Don't like 'em. Not one bit. Don't care who knows it, either."

name: Berry Angry
abilities: All Plants get +2{{Strength}}.
flavour: "Now you've done it! That's the last straw! I'm gonna berry you!"

name: Mushroom Ringleader
abilities: When played: This gets +2{{Strength}} for each other Plant.
flavour: Leadership comes with a lot of responsibility, but he knew what he signed up for.

name: Poison Ivy
abilities: {{Anti-Hero}}Anti-Hero 4
flavour: "Guess who's itching for a fight? This guy right here!"

name: Pair of Pears
abilities: When played: Make a {{Pear Pal:Pear Pal}} here.
flavour: It's cute how they're always completing each other's sentences.

name: Bluesberry
abilities: When played: Do 2 damage.
flavour: Loves to make Zombies sing the blues.

name: Sizzle
abilities: Do 5 damage to a Zombie.
flavour: Incredibly hot and full of electricity. So much ouch.

name: Banana Bomb
abilities: Do 2 damage to a Zombie.
flavour: Beware fruity vengeance from above.

name: Mushroom Grotto
abilities: When you play a Plant here, make a {{Puff-Shroom:Puff-Shroom}} in another random lane.
flavour: Sometimes beautiful things grow out of the darkest places. Ponder that for a few moments.

name: Invasive Species
abilities: While in an Environment: This gets +3{{Strength}}.
flavour: "Call me a 'weed.' Go on. I consider it a compliment."

name: Puff-Shroom
abilities: Team-Up
flavour: He huffs and puffs and, occasionally, blows a Zombie down.

name: Hot Lava
abilities: Before combat here: Do 1 damage to each Plant and Zombie here.
flavour: Lava has no loyalty. It's just hot. It just IS.

name: Veloci-Radish Hatchling
abilities: Dino-Roar: This gets +1{{Strength}}.
flavour: The root of all primeval.

name: Shroom for Two
abilities: When played: Make a {{Puff-Shroom:Puff-Shroom}} here.
flavour: Shrooms, bless their hearts, always wanting to cuddle up cuddly-like.

name: Wild Berry
abilities: {{Anti-Hero}}Anti-Hero 2 When played: This moves to a random lane.
flavour: What one word best describes Wild Berry? "Unpredictable."

name: Petal-Morphosis
abilities:
Transform a Plant into a random {{Plant:is:plant type:f include:token -"Magic Beanstalk"}}.
Draw a card.
flavour: For when it's time to turn over a new leaf.

name: Sour Grapes
abilities: When played: Do 1 damage to each Zombie.
flavour: Sour. Bitter. Resentful. It's all true. But he's got his reasons.

name: Poison Oak
abilities: {{Anti-Hero}}Anti-Hero 5
flavour: Gets lunch with Poison Ivy and Poison Mushroom every week. They have a lot to talk about.

name: Cosmic Mushroom
abilities: When played: Conjure a {{Mushroom:tribe:mushroom}}, and it gets +2{{Strength}}.
flavour: He's far out all right. Like, waaaay far out.

name: Lava Guava
abilities:
Do 2 damage to each Zombie here and next door.
If played on the Ground, make {{Hot Lava:Hot Lava}} here.
flavour: "'I try to stay cool, I really do. But Zombies! Man, they make me blow my top!"

name: Cro-Magnolia
abilities: Plant Evolution: Plants here and next door get +2{{Strength}}.
flavour: In the secret groves of Hollow Earth, Magnolias evolved to shun steely stoicism, boasting blunt barbarity.

name: Shelf Mushroom
abilities: Fusion: Do 2 damage.
flavour: Legends of Hollow Earth whisper that if you stack up enough Shelf Mushrooms, you'll eventually reach the Surface World.

name: Punish-Shroom
abilities: When a {{Mushroom:tribe:mushroom}} is destroyed, do 2 damage to a random Zombie or Zombie Hero.
flavour: Believes revenge is best served. Period.

name: Sergeant Strongberry
abilities: When another {{Berry:tribe:berry (type:f or a:do a:damage)}} hurts a Zombie or Zombie Hero, Sergeant Strongberry does 2 more damage to it.
flavour: He's intense, sure. But he just wants the berries to be all they can be.

name: Cherry Bomb
abilities: Do 4 damage to each Zombie here and next door.
flavour: Explode? Detonate? ... Explodonate!

name: Grapes of Wrath
abilities: When destroyed: Do 6 damage to the Zombie Hero.
flavour: "Everyone's always asking, 'Why so angry?' Because ZOMBIES! Sheesh. Obviously."

name: Astro-Shroom
abilities: {{Truestrike}}Bullseye When you play another Plant, do 1 damage to the Zombie Hero.
flavour: He's had good meetings with a lot of smaller asteroids. They really made an impression.

name: Banana Launcher
abilities: Start of turn: Gain a {{Banana Bomb:Banana Bomb}}.
flavour: He only knows one word. But it's a good one.

name: Pair Pearadise
abilities: When you play a Plant here, make a copy of that Plant with Team-Up here.
flavour: Peter Piper's Planet precociously picked a pair of pickled peppered pairs.

name: Fireweed
abilities: When played on the Ground: Make {{Hot Lava:Hot Lava}} here.
flavour: Don't touch the floor. The floor is lava.

name: Imitater
abilities: When you play a Plant, this transforms into a copy of that Plant.
flavour: When asked the secret to fighting zombies, Imitater replied: "...." Truly a master of his craft.

name: Strawberrian
abilities: When you play a {{Berry:tribe:berry}}, do 1 damage to Zombies next door. Berry Evolution: Gain a {{Berry Blast:Berry Blast}}.
flavour: When it's time to fight, he gets pretty juiced.

name: Pineclone
abilities: When played: Transform all Plants into Pineclones.
flavour: It's nothing personal; she just prefers the company of other Pineclones.

name: Dandy Lion King
abilities: When played: Damage the Zombie Hero for half their Health.
flavour: He's developed a taste for Zombie Heroes.

name: Kernel Corn
abilities: When played: Do 4 damage to each Zombie.
flavour: What he lacks in a sense of humor, he makes up with attitude... and dual Cob Busters.

name: Reincarnation
abilities: While in your hand: At end of turn, this transforms into a random Plant with +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}}. It keeps this ability.
flavour: "You never know what the next life has in store for you," she says. "So get the most out of this one while you can."

name: Molekale
abilities: When played: Each other Plant transforms into a random Plant that costs 1{{Sun}} more.
flavour: "And you thought spinach made you strong. Please. I am spinach times infinity."

name: Gloom-Shroom
abilities: {{Truestrike}}Bullseye Mushroom Evolution: Do 3 damage to Zombies here and next door.
flavour: Some see him as depressed, but he's got a lot of sides.

name: Veloci-Radish Packmate
abilities: When played: Make a copy of this with Team-Up here. Dino-Roar: This gets +1{{Strength}}.
flavour: Dedicated pack hunters, one roars a distraction while the other strikes from the side.

name: Blooming Heart
abilities: When this does damage, it gets +1{{Strength}}.
flavour: Sometimes we hurt the ones we love. Blooming Heart knows this all too well.

name: High-Voltage Currant
abilities: This gets +1{{Strength}} when another Berry does damage. When played: Conjure a {{Berry:tribe:berry}}.
flavour: These trouble makers are just asking to get grounded.

name: Sonic Bloom
abilities: When played: Do 1 damage the Zombie Hero for each Plant.
flavour: Victory faster than the speed of sound.

name: Transfiguration
abilities: End of Turn: This transforms into a random Plant that costs 1 more. It keeps this ability.
flavour: "By Heisenberg's Uncertainty Principle, if you look at a Plant too closely, you actually change what that Plant is..."

name: Atomic Bombegranate
abilities: When destroyed: Make {{Seedlings:Seedling}} here and next door.
flavour: Remember: Never ever EVER split a fruit. Oh, hold on, actually fruits are ok, just never split an atom.

name: Electric Blueberry
abilities: After combat here: Do 6 damage to a random Zombie or the Zombie Hero.
flavour: Does she strike a "random" Zombie with her lightning? Really? Or is she settling an old, unspoken score?

name: Hothead
abilities: Team-Up When destroyed: Do 6 damage to a Zombie here.
flavour: Sure, he has an explosive temper. But for the most part, he's pretty even peeled.

name: Meteor Strike
abilities: Do 3 damage to a Zombie.
flavour: You would think this would be especially effective against Zombies riding dinosaurs...

name: More Spore
abilities: Make a 1{{Strength}}/1{{Heart}} {{Button Mushroom:Button Mushroom}} in a lane of your choice. Then another appears in a random lane.
flavour: One good mushroom deserves another.

name: Storm Front
abilities: All Plants get +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}}.
flavour: Bad for your picnic. Good for your plants.

name: Peashooter
flavour: Started fighting Zombies in 2009... and never stopped.

name: Torchwood
abilities: Team-Up {{Peas:t:pea}} behind this get +2{{Strength}} and {{Truestrike}}Bullseye.
flavour: "Feel the burn, I COMMAND YOU!"

name: Cabbage-Pult
abilities: When played on Heights: This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}}.
flavour: "Coleslaw from above!"

name: Fertilize
abilities: A Plant gets +4{{Strength}}/+4{{Heart}}.
flavour: Stinky, sure, but powerful stuff. Ask any Plant.

name: Flourish
abilities: Draw two cards.
flavour: Call it a growth spurt.

name: Grow-Shroom
abilities: When played: Another Plant gets +2{{Strength}}/+2{{Heart}}.
flavour: She's always bringing out the best in others.

name: Repeater
abilities: {{DoubleStrike}}Double Strike
flavour: "Yes! Yes! Let's do this! Let's do this!"

name: Bonk Choy
abilities: Team-Up When played: This gets +1{{Strength}} this turn.
flavour: Little known fact: He used to have two teeth.

name: Pea Pod
abilities: Start of Turn: This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}}.
flavour: Sometimes they squabble, but they usually get along like five peas in a pod.

name: Sweet Potato
abilities: Team-Up When played: Move a Zombie to this lane.
flavour: Loves unicorns and rainbows... and watching cats on the Internet.

name: Fire Peashooter
flavour: "Is it getting hot in here or is it just me?"

name: Skyshooter
abilities: When played on Heights: This gets +2{{Strength}}/+2{{Heart}}.
flavour: The youngest Peashooter ever to earn a pilot's license. Also the only Peashooter ever to earn a pilot's license.

name: Vegetation Mutation
abilities: All Plants on Heights and Environments get +2{{Strength}}/+2{{Heart}}.
flavour: Environmentalism at its finest.

name: Sweet Pea
abilities: When played: Move a Zombie to this lane.
flavour: Zombies may only have four teeth left, but one of them's a sweet tooth.

name: Coffee Grounds
abilities: Plants here get {{DoubleStrike}}Double Strike.
flavour: Nothing wakes you up in the morning like extra attacks on zombies. Well OK, coffee does.

name: Umbrella Leaf
abilities: Team-Up Other Plants here and next door are {{Untrickable}}Untrickable.
flavour: She's not very frond of getting wet.

name: Half-Banana
abilities: When destroyed: All {{Fruit:t:Fruit type:f include:token}} in your hand get +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}}.
flavour: "Have you met my better half? She's around here somewhere."

name: Typical Beanstalk
abilities: When played next to a {{Leafy:tribe:leafy type:f}} Plant: This gets +1{{Heart}} and Conjure a {{Leafy:t:leafy}} card.
flavour: "Everyone's magic in their own special way. Everyone except me."

name: The Podfather
abilities: When you play another {{Pea:tribe:pea type:f}}, that Pea gets +2{{Strength}}/+2{{Heart}}.
flavour: "It ain't easy keeping the peas in this family."

name: Plant Food
abilities: A Plant gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}} then does a Bonus Attack.
flavour: The most important meal of the day.

name: Re-Peat Moss
abilities: When you play a Trick, this does a Bonus Attack.
flavour: "To do what I do... it's TRICKY. I'll leave it at that."

name: Whipvine
abilities: When played: Move a Zombie.
flavour: "Get along, little Zombie."

name: Super-Phat Beets
abilities: When played: This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}} for each other Plant and Zombie.
flavour: When he drops the beet, everyone feels it. Especially the Zombies.

name: Banana Peel
abilities: Move a Zombie. Conjure a {{Fruit:t:Fruit include:token}}.
flavour: A slapstick comedy staple that, somehow, the Zombies never see coming.

name: Cosmic Pea
abilities: {{DoubleStrike}}Double Strike When played: Conjure a {{Pea:t:pea}}, and it gets {{DoubleStrike}}Double Strike.
flavour: "The cosmos is so big and a pea is so small. The juxtaposition just really makes me think, you know?"

name: Bamboozle
abilities: Plant Evolution: Draw two cards.
flavour: Only among the hyper-evolved Plants of Hollow Earth can you be outwitted by a tree.

name: Pea Patch
abilities: Fusion: A Plant played on this gets +2{{Strength}}/+2{{Heart}}.
flavour: Don't let the Dog Walker anywhere near it.

name: Party Thyme
abilities: When a Plant does a Bonus Attack, draw a card.
flavour: A real extrovert, this one.

name: Black-Eyed Pea
abilities: This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}} when a Zombie Trick is played.
flavour: "You shoulda seen the other guy!"

name: Potted Powerhouse
abilities: While in your hand: This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}} when a Plant gains Strength or Health.
flavour: She loves living out of a pot. It's not for every Plant. But to her, it's home.

name: Espresso Fiesta
abilities: A Plant does three Bonus Attacks.
flavour: Don't consume after 5 p.m. You'll be up all night.

name: Moonbean
abilities: When this does damage, shuffle two {{Magic Beanstalks:Magic Beanstalk include:token}} into your deck.
flavour: She and Sunflower are besties. It's just too bad their schedules make it hard for them to get together.

name: The Red Plant-It
abilities: Plants here get +5{{Strength}}/+5{{Heart}}.
flavour: It may seem an inhospitable place for Plants, but with a little TLC and some patience, it'll grow more than just potatoes. Much more.

name: Pod Fighter
abilities: This does a Bonus Attack when you play a Plant here or next door.
flavour: They're just trying to create peas in our time.

name: Split Pea
abilities: Before combat here: This does 1 damage to the Plant Hero.
flavour: "All I wanted in life was to get ahead. But it kinda grew on me. How to face the future? I'm of two minds."

name: Grape Power
abilities:
Double a Plant's {{Strength}}.
Gain a {{Grape Responsibility:Grape Responsibility}}.
flavour: A dinosaur's favorite primordial snack.

name: Savage Spinach
abilities: Leafy Evolution: All Plants in all lanes and your hand get +2{{Strength}}.
flavour: Neptuna planned her Triassic Invasion perfectly. But like so many conquerors before her, she underestimated the Spinach.

name: Doubled Mint
abilities: Start of Turn: Double this Plant's Strength and Health.
flavour: He'll grow on you. Just give him time.

name: Muscle Sprout
abilities: This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}} when you play another Plant.
flavour: "Can you spot me, bro?"

name: Bananasaurus Rex
abilities: {{DoubleStrike}}Double Strike Dino-Roar: This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}}.
flavour: She's a banana first and a dinosaur second. But it's a close second.

name: Captain Cucumber
abilities: Cards you Conjure cost 1{{Sun}} less. When this does damage, Conjure a {{Legendary:is:plant r:l}} card.
flavour: He's steered his crew through many a pickle.

name: Onion Rings
abilities: When played: Each Plant in your hand becomes 4{{Strength}}/4{{Heart}}.
flavour: So powerful it makes you cry.

name: Gatling Pea
abilities: {{DoubleStrike}}Double Strike Pea Evolution: This does a Bonus Attack.
flavour: There is no problem that cannot be solved by more peas.

name: Apotatosaurus
abilities: {{Untrickable}}Untrickable When Played: Conjure a {{Root:t:root include:token}}. Dino-Roar: This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}}.
flavour: Some potatoes are sweet. Others are dinosaurs.

name: Clique Peas
abilities: When played: Shuffle two {{Clique Peas:Clique Peas}} into your deck. For the rest of the game, all Clique Peas get +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}} and cost +1{{Sun}}.
flavour: On Wednesdays we wear sunglasses.

name: Lily of the Valley
abilities: When you play another Plant on the Heights, that Plant gets +2{{Strength}}/+2{{Heart}}.
flavour: She's always trying to elevate her friends. She's good like that.

name: Banana Split
abilities: When destroyed: Make two {{Half-Bananas:Half-Banana}} next door.
flavour: "I don't want to brag, but hanging out in a tub full of ice-cream all day ... not a bad gig if you can get it."

name: Plucky Clover
abilities: When played: Conjure an {{Event:is:plant r:e}} card. Plucky Clover gets +{{Strength}} equal to that card's cost.
flavour: She's a giver, no doubt. But she feels like she gets a lot out of it too.

name: Embiggen
abilities: A Plant gets +2{{Strength}}/+2{{Heart}}.
flavour: Livin' large, oh yeah.

name: Holo-Flora
abilities: Draw two cards.
flavour: You got Plants!

name: Time to Shine
abilities: A Plant does a Bonus Attack.
flavour: Makes you feel all warm, glowy, and like kickin' Zombie butt.

name: Snowdrop
abilities: This gets +2{{Strength}}/+2{{Heart}} when a Zombie is {{frozen:is:plant a:freeze}}.
flavour: Zombies are always looking at her with a frozen expression.

name: Weenie Beanie
flavour: Prefers to be called "Vertically Challenged Beanie."

name: Snow Pea
abilities: When this hurts a Zombie, {{Frozen}}Freeze that Zombie.
flavour: Learned everything he knows during the Great Freeze Tag Wars of '08.

name: Cattail
abilities: Amphibious
flavour: "My secret weapon? It's my cute little hat!"

name: Smoosh-Shroom
flavour: "If I had a hammer... Wait a sec... I AM a hammer!"

name: Threepeater
abilities: Attacks here and next door.
flavour: "My favorite number is 5."

name: Iceberg Lettuce
abilities: {{Frozen}}Freeze a Zombie.
flavour: "FREEZE! Ha, just kidding. Little Iceberg humor there."

name: Shellery
abilities: Team-Up
flavour: Ordinance is most effective with peanut butter and raisins.

name: Rescue Radish
abilities: When played: Bounce another Plant.
flavour: He puts the rad in radish

name: Spring Bean
abilities: Bounce a Zombie.
flavour: His favorite season is Fall.

name: Vanilla
flavour: "I'm sorry, it's just... I have nothing interesting to say."

name: Carrotillery
abilities: Team-Up
flavour: His artillery is a rich source of vitamin A and beta-carotene - a fact the Zombies do not seem to appreciate.

name: Mars Flytrap
abilities: When this hurts the Zombie Hero, steal a section from their Super-Block Meter.
flavour: He loves Venus Flytrap, but sometimes they see things SO differently!

name: Planet of the Grapes
abilities: When a Plant here hurts the Zombie Hero, draw a card.
flavour: How this planet came to be? It's another of life's grape mysteries.

name: Leaf Blower
abilities: Amphibious When played in an Environment: Bounce a Zombie or Gravestore.
flavour: "You wanna keep your lawn tidy? Tired of lookin' at those unsightly Zombies? Then I'M your guy."

name: Grave Mistake
abilities: Bounce a Gravestone. Draw a card.
flavour: Warning: Don't flick gravestones in real life.

name: Pear Pal
abilities: Amphibious Team-Up
flavour: Has codependency issues, but he's working on it.

name: Primal Peashooter
abilities: When this hurts a Zombie, Bounce that Zombie.
flavour: Found in groups of 3, 5, 7, 11, and 31.

name: Admiral Navy Bean
abilities: Amphibious Team-Up When you play another {{Bean:t:bean}}, do 2 damage to the Zombie Hero.
flavour: "Heavy is the weight of my command. And my cap. Heavy is the cap."

name: Lightning Reed
abilities: Amphibious Splash Damage 1
flavour: "I do it for the shock value."

name: Chilly Pepper
abilities: When played: {{Frozen}}Freeze a Zombie.
flavour: "It's not easy being both hot *and* cold. A comfortable lukewarm might be nice for a change."

name: Navy Bean
abilities: Amphibious Team-Up When played: All {{Amphibious:a:amphibious is:plant type:f}} Plants get +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}}.
flavour: Was *this* close to becoming an Army Bean.

name: Jumping Bean
abilities: When played: Bounce a Zombie.
flavour: "I'm more than just a jumper... I can also leap and vault!

name: Cosmic Bean
abilities: Team-Up When played: Conjure a {{Bean:t:bean}}, and it gets Team-Up.
flavour: It IS a magical fruit!

name: Melon-Pult
abilities: Splash Damage 3
flavour: People who live in grass houses shouldn't throw stones. But melons, sure, why not?

name: Tricorn
abilities: Attacks here and next door. Plant Evolution: This gets +2{{Strength}}.
flavour: "Labor to keep alive in your breast that little spark of celestial fire called conscience." -Gourd Squashington

name: Lily Pad
abilities: Amphibious Fusion: A Plant played on this gets Amphibious. Conjure a {{Leafy:t:leafy}} card.
flavour: When Neptuna's Triassic Invasion flooded Hollow Earth with vast new oceans, Plants quickly evolved to survive.

name: Sow Magic Beans
abilities: Shuffle five {{Magic Beanstalks:Magic Beanstalk include:token}} into your deck.
flavour: Totally worth the cow.

name: Bean Counter
abilities: Team-Up This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}} when you play another {{Bean:t:bean}}. When played: Gain two {{Weenie Beanies:Weenie Beanie}}.
flavour: "Every bean is accounted for. I assure you, they all add up."

name: Snapdragon
abilities: Amphibious. Splash Damage 3
flavour: "I'm a dragon; I'm a Plant... I'm a mystery!"

name: Winter Squash
abilities: When a Zombie or Gravestone becomes {{frozen:is:plant a:freeze}}, destroy it.
flavour: "My complexion is more of a summer."

name: Laser Cattail
abilities: Amphibious Team-Up This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}} when you play a Plant here.
flavour: He's really good at entertaining himself.

name: Cool Bean
abilities: When played: {{Frozen}}Freeze all Gravestones.
flavour: "Chance of meeting Gravestones? Never tell me the odds!"

name: Bog of Enlightenment
abilities: {{Amphibious:a:amphibious is:plant type:f}} Plants here get +2{{Strength}}. Non-Amphibious Zombies here get -2{{Strength}}.
flavour: Good for Plants, it is. Good for Zombies, it is not!

name: Jelly Bean
abilities: This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}} when anything is bounced. Bean Evolution: Bounce a Zombie.
flavour: "It's not how hard the Zombies knock you down. It's how hard you bounce back."

name: Rotobaga
abilities: Amphibious This attacks both lanes next door instead of this lane.
flavour: Without flying roots, how would we get Sky-Trees??

name: Shrinking Violet
abilities: A Zombie and Zombies next door get -2{{Strength}}. Then destroy any of those Zombies that have 0{{Strength}}.
flavour: Is she cute or terrifying? Yes.

name: Brainana
abilities: Amphibious When played: The Zombie Hero loses their Brains.
flavour: In this case, "brain drain" is a good thing.

name: Winter Melon
abilities: Splash Damage 4 When played: {{Frozen}}Freeze a Zombie. When this hurts a Zombie, {{Frozen}}Freeze that Zombie.
flavour: Perfect for your winter picnics.

name: The Great Zucchini
abilities: Amphibious When played: Transform all Zombies into 1{{Strength}}/1{{Heart}} {{Zombies:is:zombie s:1 h:1 -a:a -a:e -a:i -a:o -a:u -a:y}} with no abilities
flavour: "Presto change-o! Now you see a powerful Zombie. Now you don't!"

name: Shooting Starfruit
abilities: This attacks in all five lanes.
flavour: When you see a Shooting Starfruit, make a wish, any wish! Any wish that involves takin' down Zombies, that is.

name: Dark Matter Dragonfruit
abilities: Amphibious Splash Damage 6 Zombie Tricks cost 6{{Brain}} more.
flavour: Their ancestors were hunted to the depths of space. Now their descendants are back for cold, fruity vengeance.

name: Lima-Pleurodon
abilities: Amphibious Dino-Roar: Shuffle a {{Magic Beanstalk:Magic Beanstalk include:token}} into your deck.
flavour: Sometimes one Plant provides both the Army and the Navy.

name: Bird of Paradise
abilities: Amphibious Start of turn: Conjure a {{Superpower: is:plant t:superpower include:superpower}}.
flavour: Her beautiful melodies are echoed by the roars of dinosaurs.

name: Spyris
abilities: Amphibious You can tap Gravestones to see which Zombies are hiding in them.
flavour: You can't hide anything from her. Don't even try. She'll get inside your HEAD.

name: Go-Nuts
abilities: Team-Up When you play a {{Team-Up:a:team-up type:f}} Plant, all Team-Up Plants get +1{{Strength}}.
flavour: "GROW-Nuts! THROW-Nuts! When we get big we GO-Nuts! Goooooooo PLANTS!"

name: Mayflower
abilities: Amphibious When this hurts the Zombie Hero, Conjure a {{Corn:t:corn}}, {{Squash:t:squash}}, or {{Bean:t:bean}}.
flavour: Do April showers bring Mayflowers? My goodness, isn't that a personal question!

name: Sportacus
abilities: When a Zombie Trick is played, do 2 damage to the Zombie Hero.
flavour: "I am Sportacus!"

name: Snake Grass
abilities: Amphibious Start of Turn: Make another {{Snake Grass:Snake Grass}} in the lane to the right.
flavour: "Snakes. Why'd it have to be snakes?"

name: Witch Hazel
abilities: End of Turn: Destroy a random Zombie and make a {{Puff-Shroom:Puff-Shroom}} there.
flavour: Zombies are always trying to build a bridge out of her.

name: Jolly Holly
abilities: Amphibious When played: {{Frozen}}Freeze Zombies next door.
flavour: No exaggeration, she is ALWAYS in a great mood. Even when fighting Zombies. "What's not to love about saving the world?" she says.

name: Sap-Fling
abilities: When played: Make a {{Sappy Place:Sappy Place include:token}} Environment.
flavour: He dates a lot of different branches, but nothing ever sticks.

name: Magic Beanstalk
abilities: When played: Draw a card.
flavour: Giant not included.

name: Sappy Place
abilities: Zombies here get -3{{Strength}}
flavour: Zombies just hate a sappy ending.

name: Big Chill
abilities: {{Frozen}}Freeze a Zombie. Draw a card.
flavour: Discerning Plants agree: Zombies are best served on ice.

name: Transmogrify
abilities: Transform a Zombie into a random {{Zombie:is:zombie type:f c:1 include:token}} that costs 1{{Brain}}.
flavour: It's a life-changing experience. Actually, it's an everything-changing experience.

name: Whirlwind
abilities: Bounce a random Zombie.
flavour: There's no place like home. There's no place like home.

name: Lieutenant Carrotron
abilities: Team-Up When played: Conjure a {{Root:t:root include:token}}.
flavour: Beta-Carrotina knows she can always count on him to get to the root of the problem.

name: Lightspeed Seed
abilities: Conjure two {{Tricks:is:plant type:t}}.
flavour: Make the jump to light seed.

name: Bellflower
flavour: She wants to be friends with Snowdrop soooo badly, but she feels like she's always getting the cold shoulder.

name: Sunflower
abilities: Team-Up Start of Turn: You get +1{{Sun}} this turn.
flavour: "Not to brag, but I'm pretty much your basic franchise-founding superstar."

name: Mixed Nuts
abilities: When played: This gets +2{{Strength}}/+2{{Heart}} if there's a Plant with {{Team-Up:a:team-up type:f}} here.
flavour: They work hard but they also like to party. That's them in a nutshell.

name: Squash
abilities: Destroy a Zombie.
flavour: Has a bad case of Resting Squash Face.

name: Smashing Pumpkin
flavour: Sure, he and Squash are pals. But there's always an undercurrent of competition between them.

name: Morning Glory
abilities: When played: This gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}} if you made at least 6{{Sun}} this turn.
flavour: Just don't talk to her before she's had her Coffee Bean.

name: Fume-Shroom
abilities: {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough
flavour: "I'm like the wind. Near a hog farm."

name: Pepper M.D.
abilities: This gets +2{{Strength}}/+2{{Heart}} when a Plant or your Hero is healed.
flavour: "A toast to your health... and mine!"

name: Water Balloons
abilities: A non-Amphibious Zombie gets -2{{Strength}}/-2{{Heart}}. If you made at least 6{{Sun}} this turn, it gets -3{{Strength}}/-3{{Heart}} instead.
flavour: You're gonna need a towel for this one.

name: Venus Flytrap
abilities: When this does damage, heal your Hero for that much.
flavour: "Mom always said, 'If you leave your trap open like that, you'll catch Zombies.' So I did."

name: Bloomerang
abilities: {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough
flavour: "Magnets? Gravity? Crikey, I don't have a clue why they come back."

name: Metal Petal Sunflower
abilities: Start of Turn: You gain +1{{Sun}} this turn.
flavour: "Time to put the metal to the petal, baby!"

name: Cosmoss
abilities: When an Environment is played, this gets +2{{Strength}}/+2{{Heart}}.
flavour: He's Peel deGrass Lichen's biggest fan.

name: Apple-Saucer
abilities: When played: If you made at least 6{{Sun}} this turn, this gets {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough.
flavour: Watchful Quasar Wizards sometimes spot an Unidentified Fruiting Object.

name: Venus Flytraplanet
abilities: When a Plant here does damage and survives, heal your Hero for that much.
flavour: Not far from Mars Flytraplanet.

name: Kernel-Pult
abilities: Team-Up When played on Heights: A Zombie gets -1{{Strength}}/-1{{Heart}}.
flavour: Insert corny joke here.

name: Lil' Buddy
abilities: Team-Up When played: Heal your Hero for 2.
flavour: Wait, you want me to go in *front*?!?

name: Sunnier-Shroom
abilities: Team-Up Start of Turn: You get +2{{Sun}} this turn.
flavour: Compared to his little brother, he's the one with the sunnier disposition.

name: Sage Sage
abilities: When played: If you made at least 6{{Sun}} this turn, draw a card.
flavour: Got his start writing messages for fortune cookies.

name: Magnifying Grass
abilities: When played: This gets +1{{Strength}} for each Sun you made this turn.
flavour: Zombies may appear closer than they are.

name: Whack-a-Zombie
abilities: Destroy a Zombie with 3{{Strength}} or less.
flavour: It's hammer time. #hadtobesaid

name: Lawnmower
abilities: Destroy a Zombie on the Ground.
flavour: The thing of Zombie nightmares.

name: Power Flower
abilities: {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough Start of Turn: Heal your Hero for 1 for each {{Flower:t:flower -type:t}}.
flavour: Dropped out of Kale University to practice natural medicine.

name: Cosmic Flower
abilities: {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough When played: Conjure a {{Flower:t:flower}}, and it gets {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough.
flavour: She enjoys the simple things in life - hanging out with friends, fighting Zombies, and basking in cosmic rays.

name: Heartichoke
abilities: When a Plant or your Hero is healed, do that much damage to the Zombie Hero.
flavour: She's a sweetheart, she really is. But fighting Zombies...it's made her hard.

name: Elderberry
abilities: {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough Plant Evolution: This gets +3{{Strength}}.
flavour: He makes yelling "Get off my lawn" into an art form.

name: Eyespore
abilities: Fusion: Destroy a Zombie here.
flavour: Really good at staring contests.

name: Twin Sunflower
abilities: Team-Up Start of Turn: You get +2{{Sun}} this turn.
flavour: "We're actually only fraternal twins."

name: 2nd-Best Taco of All Time
abilities:
Heal 4.
Draw a card.
flavour: Significantly better than the 3rd-Best Taco of All Time.

name: Chomper
abilities: When played: Destroy a Zombie here with 3{{Strength}} or less.
flavour: "A free buffet? How kind! Don't mind if I do!"

name: Laser Bean
abilities: {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough. When played: This gets +1{{Strength}} for each Sun you made this turn.
flavour: "Physics, baby! I'm emittin' all KINDS of coherent radiation!"

name: Solar Winds
abilities: End of Turn: If there are no Zombies here, make a {{Sunflower:Sunflower c:1 s:0}} here.
flavour: There's something in the wind. Sunflower seeds, in fact.

name: Wing-Nut
abilities: Zombies can't do {{Bonus Attacks:is:zombie a:"bonus attack" -bucket}}.
flavour: Firmly believes that Elvis is alive, Zombies never walked on the Moon, and that Dr. Zomboss is secretly studying aliens at Area 22. Crazy!

name: Tactical Cuke
abilities: Destroy all Plants and Zombies on the Ground.
flavour: He comes from a long line of very precise cucumbers.

name: Primal Sunflower
abilities: Start of turn: You get +2{{Sun}}.
flavour: Sunflowers are notorious pacifists. But isolated in the center of Hollow Earth, they evolved a new savagery. Sunny, adorable savagery.

name: Sunflower Seed
abilities: When destroyed: Make a {{Sunflower:Sunflower c:1 s:0}} here.
flavour: From every night's end comes the beginning of a new Sunflower's dawn.

name: Cross-Pollination
abilities: Conjure a {{Flower:t:flower}}. Conjure a {{Trick:is:plant type:t}}. They both cost 1 less.
flavour: Each Plant is grown with the power of solar radiation. Sometimes you just have to let it out.

name: Briar Rose
abilities: When a Zombie hurts a {{Flower:t:flower type:f}}, destroy that Zombie.
flavour: "You mess with the rose, you get the thorns!"

name: Three-Headed Chomper
abilities: End of Turn: Destroy all Zombies here and next door.
flavour: "You know the old saying, 'Three heads are better than one'? Totally true."

name: Cornucopia
abilities: When played: Make a random Plant in each other lane.
flavour: Thanksgiving came early this year.

name: Astrocado
abilities: {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough When destroyed: Gain an {{Astrocado Pit:Astrocado Pit include:token}}.
flavour: "Holy guacamole!"

name: Astro Vera
abilities: When played: Increase your Hero's maximum {{Heart}} by 10. Heal your Hero for 10.
flavour: Your Hero will feel out of this world. And so will your skin.

name: Cob Cannon
abilities: When played: Zombies here and next door get -1{{Strength}}/-1{{Heart}}. Team-Up Evolution: Destroy a Zombie.
flavour: He focuses his fearsome firepower with a single, ringing credo: "One Team. One Dream."

name: Aloesaurus
abilities: Dino-Roar: Heal all Plants and the Plant Hero for 1.
flavour: A roaring force of life. A crushing force of destruction.

name: Haunted Pumpking
abilities: When played: The Zombie player Conjures a {{Monster:t:monster}}.
flavour: For generations, the Pumpkings have kept their realms safe from a terrible curse. Tonight, they finally face their greatest fear.

name: Sun-Shroom
abilities: Team-Up Start of Turn: You get +1{{Sun}} this turn and this transforms into a {{Sunnier-Shroom:Sunnier-Shroom}}.
flavour: "Fun in the Sun? That's for other Plants. I just make the stuff. I don't actually like it."

name: Jack O' Lantern
abilities: {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough This gets +1{{Strength}} when it hurts the Zombie Hero.
flavour: "I just love to get Zombies all fired up. If you catch my drift."

name: Ketchup Mechanic
abilities: When played: For each Zombie, this gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}} and Heal the Plant Hero for 1.
flavour: Catchup mechanics help you get back in a game when you're behind. Ketchup Mechanics fix your fruit.

name: Toadstool
abilities: When played: Destroy a Zombie here with 4{{Strength}} or less. Start of Turn: You get +1{{Sun}} this turn.
flavour: Toadstool can't stand being idle. When there's work to be done, she's always the first to hop to it.

name: Astrocado Pit
abilities: Start of turn: This transforms into an Astrocado.
flavour: Getting defeated is the pits.

name: Geyser
abilities: Heal your Hero and all Plants for 4.
flavour: H2Oh no you didn't!

name: Scorched Earth
abilities: All Zombies on the Ground get -1{{Strength}}/-1{{Heart}}.
flavour: Unfortunately the Zombies were all out of SPF 9000.

name: Weed Whack
abilities: A Zombie gets -2{{Strength}}/-2{{Heart}}.
flavour: Good for weeding out Zombies.

name: Flick-a-Zombie
abilities: Do 1 damage.
flavour: Bad Zombie! BAD Zombie!

name: Inspire
abilities: A Plant gets +1{{Strength}}/+1{{Heart}}.
flavour: One small step for Plants. One giant leap for Plant-kind!

name: Rejuvenate
abilities: Heal 2.
flavour: Like a salve for a Plant's soul.
